footer.address: Mary, st. Shajahan, 22, Mary region, Turkmenistan

aboutCompany.title: About the Company
aboutCompany.description: A leader in paper product and household chemicals manufacturing since 2008. We create products that meet the highest standards of quality and eco-friendliness.
aboutCompany.historyDescription: More than 16 years of successful operation in the market and continuous improvement of production processes.
aboutCompany.valuesDescription: Quality, innovation, and environmental sustainability in every aspect of our business.
aboutCompany.approachDescription: Modern technologies and strict quality control at every stage of production.

advantagesSection.highQualityDescription: We use only eco-friendly materials and modern equipment to ensure excellent quality of our products.
advantagesSection.affordablePricesDescription: Through optimized production and direct supplies, we offer competitive prices without compromising quality.
advantagesSection.reliableSuppliesDescription: Fast logistics and strict adherence to delivery deadlines make us a reliable partner for our clients.

faqSection.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faqSection.description: Answers to popular questions from our customers
faqSection.answer1: Contact us by phone or via the form on the website. Our managers will help you choose the optimal range and calculate the cost, considering the order volume and delivery conditions.
faqSection.question2: Are there discounts for wholesale orders?
faqSection.answer2: Yes, we offer individual conditions for each partner. The discount size depends on the order volume, frequency of deliveries, and duration of cooperation.
faqSection.question3: What quality certificates are available for the products?
faqSection.answer3: All our products have the necessary quality certificates and meet international standards. We provide a full set of documentation upon request.

contactSection.title: Contact Us
contactSection.description: We are always open to cooperation and ready to answer all your questions. Our specialists will advise you on any issue related to our products.
contactSection.address: Mary, st. Shajahan, 22, Mary region, Turkmenistan

step1.title: Raw Material Procurement
step1.description: We use only high-quality raw materials from trusted suppliers, which undergo strict quality control before entering production.

step2.title: Production
step2.description: Modern equipment and automated production lines allow us to create the highest quality products with minimal environmental impact.

step3.title: Packaging and Delivery
step3.description: Our products are packaged in eco-friendly materials and delivered to customers with all necessary storage and transport conditions.

process.description: From raw material procurement to the delivery of finished products, each stage of production is monitored by our experts to ensure the highest quality.

HeroSection.subtitle: our mission!
HeroSection.description: Since 2008, Altyn Gaya has been creating high-quality cleaning products that transform a home into a space of cleanliness, comfort, and safety through proven reliability and unmatched effectiveness.

contact.successMessage: Message successfully sent! We will get back to you soon.
contact.errorMessage: There was an error sending your message. Please try again later.
contact.description: We are always happy to help you choose our products and answer any questions. Contact us in any way convenient for you.
contact.subject: Subject
contact.notFoundAnswer: Didn't find the answer to your question? Contact us directly!

faq.faqDescription: Here you'll find answers to the most common questions about our company and products.
faq.question1: How to place an order for products?
faq.answer1: You can place an order through our website, by phone at +993 61 64 09 21, or by sending a request via email. Our managers will contact you to confirm the order details.
faq.answer2: Yes, we offer international shipping for our products. The cost and delivery time are calculated individually depending on the destination country.
faq.question3: Do you have a loyalty program for regular customers?
faq.answer3: Yes, we have a loyalty program for regular customers, which offers special pricing and cooperation terms. Details can be obtained from our managers.
